Body:
left1 = -10
center1 = 0
right1 = 10
left2 = 0
center2 = 10
right2 = 20
step = 5
func1 = TriFunc(left1 / 10.0, center1 / 10.0, right1 / 10.0)
func2 = TriFunc(left2 / 10.0, center2 / 10.0, right2 / 10.0)
func = func1 * func2
for x in range(left1 - step, right2 + step, step):
    x1 = x / 10.0
    f1 = func1(x1)
    f2 = func2(x1)
    f = func(x1)
    self.assertEqual(f, f1 * f2)
